Text: I've successfully burnt  into 2 dvd-roms, 1 ordinary and 1 rewritable , in 2 speeds , at first at 4x and the rewritable at 2x. Both of them could not boot and wrote that it might be an error during the burning , that the system restarted from power failure etc. also the torrent stops at 99.9%. Please fix it and reload it. I need it bad!!!
